text: Roberto Vallejo (born 1 June 1935) is a Mexican wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle featherweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Mexico Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Salvatierra, Guanajuato Category:Pan American Games medalists in wrestling Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Mexico Category:Wrestlers at the 1959 Pan American Games Category:Wrestlers at the 1967 Pan American Games
title: Roberto Vallejo
